data.Sentence_cn: 去年圣诞节，马戏团老板吉米.盖茨决定送些礼物给儿童医院。
data.Sentence: Last Christmas, the circus owner, Jimmy Gates, decided to take some presents to a children's hospital.

data.Sentence_cn: 他打扮成圣诞老人，在由6个漂亮姑娘组成的“仪仗队”的陪同下，
data.Sentence: Dressed up as Father Christmas and accompanied by a 'guard of honour' of six pretty girls,

data.Sentence_cn: 骑上一头名叫江伯的小象，沿着城里的主要街道出发了。
data.Sentence: he set off down the main street of the city riding a baby elephant called Jumbo.

data.Sentence_cn: 他本该知道警察绝不会允许这类事情发生。
data.Sentence: He should have known that the police would never allow this sort of thing.

data.Sentence_cn: 一个警察走过来告诉吉米，他应该走一条小路，因为江泊阻碍了交通。
data.Sentence: A policeman approached Jimmy and told him he ought to have gone along a side street as Jumbo was holding up the traffic.

data.Sentence_cn: 虽然吉米同意马上就走，但江伯却拒绝移动。
data.Sentence: Though Jimmy agreed to go at once, Jumbo refused to move.

data.Sentence_cn: 15个警察不得不用很大的力气把它推离主要街道。
data.Sentence: Fifteen policemen had to push very hard to get him off the main street.

data.Sentence_cn: 警察虽然吃了苦头，但他们还是感到很有趣。
data.Sentence: The police had a difficult time, but they were most amused.

data.Sentence_cn: “江伯一定有好几吨重，”一个警察事后这样说，
data.Sentence: 'Jumbo must weigh a few tons,' said a policeman afterwards,

data.Sentence_cn: “值得庆幸的是它没让我们抬它走。
data.Sentence: 'so it was fortunate that we didn't have to carry him.

data.Sentence_cn: 当然，我们应该逮捕它，但由于它一贯表现很好，这次我们饶了它。”
data.Sentence: Of course, we should arrest him, but as he has a good record, we shall let him off this time.'
